Rule #1, Once you have their money, you never give it back.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "The Nagus", "Heart of Stone")
Rule #3, Never spend more for an acquisition than you have to.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "The Maquis, Part II")
Rule #6, Never allow family to stand in the way of opportunity. 
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "The Nagus"; ENT: "Acquisition")
Rule #7, Keep your ears open.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "In the Hands of the Prophets")
Rule #9, Opportunity plus instinct equals profit.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "The Storyteller")
Rule #10, Greed is eternal.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Prophet Motive"; VOY: "False Profits")
Rule #16, A deal is a deal. 
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Melora")
Rule #17, A contract is a contract is a contract… but only between Ferengi. 
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Body Parts")
Rule #18, A Ferengi without profit is no Ferengi at all.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Heart of Stone", "Ferengi Love Songs")
Rule #21, Never place friendship above profit.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Rules of Acquisition")
Rule #22, A wise man can hear profit in the wind.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Rules of Acquisition"; VOY: "False Profits")
Rule #23, Nothing is more important than your health… except for your money.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (ENT: "Acquisition")
Rule #31, Never make fun of a Ferengi's mother. 
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "The Siege")
Rule #33, It never hurts to suck up to the boss. 
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Rules of Acquisition", "The Dogs of War")
Rule #34, War is good for business. 
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Destiny", "The Siege of AR-558")
Rule #35, Peace is good for business. 
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (TNG: "The Perfect Mate"; DS9: "Destiny")
Rule #45, Expand or die. 
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (ENT: "Acquisition"; VOY: "False Profits")
Rule #47, Don't trust a man wearing a better suit than your own.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Rivals")
Rule #48, The bigger the smile, the sharper the knife.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Rules of Acquisition")
Rule #57, Good customers are as rare as latinum. Treasure them.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Armageddon Game")
Rule #59, Free advice is seldom cheap.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Rules of Acquisition")
Rule #62, The riskier the road, the greater the profit.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Rules of Acquisition", "Little Green Men", "Business as Usual")
Rule #74, Knowledge equals profit.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (VOY: "Inside Man")
Rule #75, Home is where the heart is, but the stars are made of latinum.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Civil Defense")
Rule #76, Every once in a while, declare peace. It confuses the hell out of your enemies.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "The Homecoming")
Rule #94, Females and finances don't mix.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Ferengi Love Songs", "Profit and Lace")
Rule #95, Expand or die. 
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (VOY: "False Profits"; ENT: "Acquisition")
Rule #98, Every man has his price.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "In the Pale Moonlight")
Rule #102, Nature decays, but latinum lasts forever.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "The Jem'Hadar")
Rule #103, Sleep can interfere with… 
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Rules of Acquisition")
Rule #109, Dignity and an empty sack is worth the sack.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Rivals")
Rule #111, Treat people in your debt like family… exploit them.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Past Tense, Part I", "The Darkness and the Light")
Rule #112, Never have sex with the boss' sister.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Playing God")
Rule #125, You can't make a deal if you're dead.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "The Siege of AR-558")
Rule #139, Wives serve, brothers inherit.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Necessary Evil")
Rule #168, Whisper your way to success.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Treachery, Faith and the Great River")
Rule #190, Hear all, trust nothing.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Call to Arms")
Rule #194, It's always good business to know about new customers before they walk in your door. 
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Whispers")
Rule #203, New customers are like razor-toothed gree-worms. They can be succulent, but sometimes they bite back.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Little Green Men")
Rule #208, Sometimes the only thing more dangerous than a question is an answer.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Ferengi Love Songs")
Rule #211, Employees are the rungs on the ladder of success. Don't hesitate to step on them.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Bar Association")
Rule #214, Never begin a business negotiation on an empty stomach.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "The Maquis, Part I")
Rule #217, You can't free a fish from water.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Past Tense, Part I")
Professor Natima Lang: You seem to have kept busy.
Quark: Oh, yes, I'm very successful, But as the 223rd Rule of Acquisition says-- (interrupted)
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9: "Profit and Loss")
Rule #229, Latinum lasts longer than lust.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Ferengi Love Songs")
Rule #239, Never be afraid to mislabel a product. 
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Body Parts")
Rule #263, Never allow doubt to tarnish your lust for latinum.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "Bar Association")
Rule #285, No good deed ever goes unpunished.
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (DS9: "The Collaborator", "The Sound of Her Voice")
A man is only worth the sum of his possessions. 
-- Grand Nagus Gint, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Canonical (ENT: "Acquisition")
Rule #286, When Morn leaves, it's all over. 
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Unofficial (DS9: "The House of Quark")
Rule #299, After you've exploited someone, it never hurts to thank them. That way, it's easier to exploit them next time. 
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Unofficial (VOY: "False Profits")
Exploitation begins at home. 
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Unofficial (VOY: "False Profits")
When no appropriate rule applies, make one up. 
(The unwritten rule)
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Unofficial (VOY: "False Profits")
When the messenger comes to appropriate your profits… kill the messenger. 
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Unofficial (VOY: "False Profits")
Time, like latinum, is a highly limited commodity. 
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Unofficial (DS9: "Bar Association")
Always inspect the merchandise before making a deal. 
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Unofficial (DS9: "The Abandoned")
Money is money, but females are better. 
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Unofficial (DS9: "Life Support")
Why ask, when you can take? 
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Unofficial (DS9: "Babel")
Good things come in small packages 
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Unofficial (DS9: "Move Along Home")
A good lie is easier to believe than the truth. 
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Unofficial (VOY: "Shattered")
If that's what's written, then that's what's written. 
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Unofficial (DS9: "Favor the Bold")
A distracted policeman is an opportunity. 
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Unofficial (DS9: "The Sound of Her Voice")
Rule #2, The best deal is the one that brings the most profit.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (The 34th Rule)
Rule #2, Money is everything.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Strange New Worlds 9: "The Last Tree on Ferenginar: A Ferengi Fable From the Future")
Rule #8, Small print leads to large risk.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #13, Anything worth doing is worth doing for money.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #19, Satisfaction is not guaranteed.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #27, There's nothing more dangerous than an honest businessman.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #39, Don't tell customers more than they need to know.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Ascendance)
Rule #40, She can touch your lobes, but never your latinum.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #41, Profit is its own reward.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #44, Never confuse wisdom with luck.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #52, Never ask when you can take.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #53, Never trust anybody taller than you.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Twilight)
Rule #54, Rate divided by time equals profit. (Also known as the "Velocity of Wealth")
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Raise the Dawn)
Rule #55, Take joy from profit and profit from joy.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Raise the Dawn)
Rule #58, There is no substitute for success.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi; Star Trek: The Next Generation - Birth of the Federation (Ferengi Opening))
Rule #60, Keep your lies consistent.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #65, Win or lose, there's always Hupyrian beetle snuff.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #68, Risk doesn't always equal reward.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Star Trek Online)
Rule #77, If you break it, I'll charge you for it.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Star Trek Online)
Rule #79, Beware of the Vulcan greed for knowledge.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #82, The flimsier the product, the higher the price.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #85, Never let the competition know what you're thinking.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #87, Learn the customer's weaknesses so you can better take advantage of them.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Star Trek: Elite Force II)
Rule #88, Vengeance will cost you everything.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (The Poisoned Chalice)
Rule #89, Ask not what your profits can do for you, but what you can do for your profits.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #97, Enough… is never enough.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #98, If you can't take it with you, don't go.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (I, Q)
Rule #99, Trust is the biggest liability of all.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #100, When it's good for business, tell the truth.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Ascendance)
Rule #101, Profit trumps emotion.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (The Long Mirage)
Rule #104, Faith moves mountains… of inventory.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #106, There is no honor in poverty.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #108, Hope doesn't keep the lights on.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Sacraments of Fire)
Rule #113, Always have sex with the boss.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi, The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition)
Rule #121, Everything is for sale, even friendship.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #123, Even a blind man can recognize the glow of latinum.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #135, Listen to secrets, but never repeat them.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Ascendance)
Rule #141, Only fools pay retail.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #144, There's nothing wrong with charity… as long as it winds up in your pocket.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #147, People love the bartender.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Fearful Symmetry)
Rule #151, Even when you're a customer, sell yourself.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (The Long Mirage)
Rule #162, Even in the worst of times, someone turns a profit.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #177, Know your enemies… but do business with them always.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #181, Not even dishonesty can tarnish the shine of profit.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #189, Let others keep their reputation. You keep their latinum.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #192, Never cheat a Klingon… unless you can get away with it.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #193, It's never too late to fire the staff.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Cathedral)
Rule #193, Trouble comes in threes.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Star Trek Online)
Rule #202, The justification for profit is profit.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #216, Never gamble with a telepath.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (The Laertian Gamble)
Rule #218, Always know what you're buying.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #218, Sometimes what you get free costs entirely too much.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Malibu DS9: "Baby on Board")
Rule #223, Beware the man who doesn't make time for oo-mox.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #235, Duck; death is tall.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Twilight)
Rule #236, You can't buy fate.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #242, More is good… All is better.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #243, Always leave yourself an out.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Sacraments of Fire)
Rule #255, A wife is a luxury… a smart accountant a necessity.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #261, A wealthy man can afford anything except a conscience.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #266, When in doubt, lie.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #267, If you believe it, they believe it.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Star Trek Titan: Taking Wing)
Rule #284, Deep down, everyone's a Ferengi.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Legends of the Ferengi)
Rule #305, Always be considerate.
(Not an official Rule, of course, but quoted by Quark.)
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Twilight)
Rule #431, When the shooting starts, let the mercenaries handle it.
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Star Trek Online)
Time is money.
(Not an official Rule; Quark considered it one of the "few pieces of sound business advice that he'd ever heard uttered by a hew-mon.")
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Sacraments of Fire)
You get what you pay for.
(A Human saying that Quark sometimes set store by.)
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (The Long Mirage)
If they can't be bought, get ready to fight.
(A rule proposed by Grand Nagus Rom in response to the Hur'q invasion.)
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Star Trek Online)
It's not smart to turn down a deal with the Grand Nagus.
(A rule Rom proposed when Brunt tried and failed to double-cross him and Quark.)
-- Ferengi Rules of Acquisition - Apocryphal (Star Trek Online)
Rule #1, If they want their money back, give it to them.
-- Grand Nagus Zek, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition, Revised (DS9: "Prophet Motive")
Rule #10, Greed is dead.
-- Grand Nagus Zek, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition, Revised (DS9: "Prophet Motive")
Rule #21, Never place profit before friendship.
-- Grand Nagus Zek, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition, Revised (DS9: "Prophet Motive")
Rule #22, Latinum tarnishes, but family is forever.
-- Grand Nagus Zek, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition, Revised (DS9: "Prophet Motive")
Rule #23, Money can never replace dignity.
-- Grand Nagus Zek, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition, Revised (DS9: "Prophet Motive")
Rule #285, A good deed is its own reward.
-- Grand Nagus Zek, Ferengi Rules of Acquisition, Revised (DS9: "Prophet Motive")
